means: 足内翻的，脚趾向内弯的，内八字脚

sentence.Network_en: The photo shows the model in a pigeon - toed pose and covering her modesty with her hands.
sentence.Network_cn: 照片中的布吕尼双腿呈内八字姿势,双手遮住了羞处.

sentence.Network_en: A pigeon emerges, wings flapping noisily, from the tower.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只鸽子从塔里钻出来，扑扑地拍打着翅膀。

sentence.Network_en: He tip-toed to the door in his stockinged feet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他踮着脚尖走到门口，只穿着袜子没穿鞋。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2006年8月13日 -  pigeon house 鸽笼 pigeon 鸽子 pigeon's milk 不存在的事物 pigeon-breasted 鸡胸的 pigeon-livered 温柔的 pigeon-toed 足内翻的 pigeonhearted.
pigeon-toed-pigeon-toed adj. [医]足内翻的, 脚趾向内弯的, 内八字脚... pigeon-toed  adj. pigeon-toed[医]足内翻的, 脚趾向内弯的, 内八字脚.
而我呢,却与生俱来了一双内八字脚,简直就是家庭里的怪胎。 内八字脚(Pigeon-toed)甚至还不足以描述我这些时日里的疯狂的步态。当我走路的时候,感觉就好像我的.

list.abs: start slow with forward bends and calf stretches , move on to pigeon pose and plow at the end .开始时缓慢的前倾伸展和小腿伸展，然后摆出鸽子的姿势再是犁头的姿势。

standing in the world to another corner quietly waiting for pigeons to fly back a day every day in the morning I would open the door that south-facing windows , waiting on the only hope to it .站在世界的另一角悄悄地等待着白鸽的飞回来，每天的每天，清晨我都会打开朝南的那扇窗户等待着，就只希望这样而已。
studies on enzymatic hydrolysis to pigeon meat ., 复合酶水解乳鸽肉的研究.
they raise ducks instead of chicken blood . ( isn't it better to raise pigeons ? ) Always make preparations before rain and you can also be the wise .他们在发洪水之前养鸭，而不是养鸡。（养鸽子不是更好吗？)

entry.def: Someone who is pigeon-toed walks with their toes pointing slightly inwards.
